summary: THE VEHICLE HAS A HARD THROTTLE WHEN PRESSED, CONSUMER STATES THE THROTTLE HAS TO BE PRESSED VERY HARD, THEN VEHICLE WILL TAKE OFF UNEXPECTEDLY.  OFTEN NEARLY HITTING ANOTHER VEHICLE.  CONSUMER STATES CARBON HAS BUILT UP AROUND THE BRAKE PEDAL.  DEALER WILL CLEAN OFF THE CARBON. PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
